name: Upcall
headline: Upcall provides outbound call professionals as a service.
description:
Upcall helps hundreds of companies acquire, qualify, engage and retain more customers through outbound phone calls.

Upcall's platform and API give 24/7 access to 1000s vetted US based callers as well as various tools to manage call campaigns effectively such as script templates, call analytics and recording, as well as integrations with client's existing workflow (Slack, Salesforce, Google Calendar, Outlook, ...).

Upcall was part of the prestigious Y Combinator.

# The Smartest Way to Engage & Convert Your Leads
Upcall combines technology with the top 3% sales professionals to create real phone / email / text conversations and always follow up at the right time and with the right message 
[GET STARTED](https://www.upcall.com/</leads/new>)

## FULL TRANSPARENCY WITH YOUR REALTIME DASHBOARD
We give you a team of professional Upcallers to do your calls, and intuitive software to monitor your results. It’s everything you need to engage your contacts—without actually having to do the call yourself.
![](https://static-assets.upcall.com/assets/application_v2/pics/qualification/mac-00d057f2d66c91e24e7660ca87fbc4b2e7feae3fb34ad311958648ed7bafd3b3.png) ![](https://static-assets.upcall.com/assets/application_v2/pics/landingpages/lead-providers-laptop-7eea99e9349fbf06ccf6b2a670cf77814579fd40e909ff98db8bee4d49a4599a.png)

## Nothing Beats A Phone Call
When you want to engage your leads, nothing beats interacting with a real person.
### 92% of all customer interactionshappen on the phone
### 21xMORE LIKELY TO CONTACT A LEADif called within the first 5 minutes
### 91% of marketing leadsare never qualified
### 90%MORE LIKELY TO CONVERT A LEADif you reach out minimum six times

## How Upcall Works
### 1A new lead comes in
It is automatically added to your campaign from any sources (Excel, API, online forms, CRM…) 
![People holding a pen](https://static-assets.upcall.com/assets/application_v2/pics/illu-16ebf43422231eb91acb60a7d66ef5fa38998b5a6c6fadec030e7e33926bcebc.png)
### Upcall calls within seconds
We engage in two-way conversations by phone and text. Our Upcallers are fully trained and experts at finding decision makers. We even call back 4 more times if they don't answer.
![Dynamic call script sequence](https://static-assets.upcall.com/assets/application_v2/pics/illu2-36ac983c0f7ebc46801509266e5b964138fa62d80036017c1c3dbc24fd660811.png)
### 3Get notified with actionable results
We send you detailed call notes and the next steps immediately after hanging up. We even set meetings straight into your calendar and sync results with over 1,000 tools.
![People collaborating](https://static-assets.upcall.com/assets/application_v2/pics/illu3-c3e863252e0fbec14c09c3d0972f9c7f431394137cfb5744ee98bc4d942ae2a7.png)
[Get started](https://www.upcall.com/</leads/new>)

## Meet the Upcaller Network
These are the magic makers. Upcallers work behind the scenes to help your company scale and provide the experience and skills to match your needs.
  * ##### FULLY MANAGED
We only work with the top 5% call professionals who apply. All of our Upcallers are screened, vetted, and onboarded.
  * ##### HIGH QUALITY 
Our algorithm assigns your calls to the most fitting Upcallers based on location, industry and expertise.
  * ##### TRANSPARENT
Because Upcallers use our platform, you’re guaranteed consistent results and reporting of every call.
  * ##### ACCURATE
Upcallers use our various call dispositions, which help you analyze conversations at scale.


![](https://static-assets.upcall.com/assets/application_v2/pics/qualification/quote5-9950cd5e8bf20a81565686e2aa1527e855588df342dba1cbda0ba23a3ac15365.png)
Upcall has been a fantastic solution for our needs as a super fast growing company.
![](https://static-assets.upcall.com/assets/airbnb-cba8c40f73ab81127e6be38ff27782ac785741eb3ae28a87b41a41edc7c2c5a9.png)
Carles Roca Bañón
Sales Manager for North America at AirBnB (HotelTonight)

## FULL TRANSPARENCY WITH YOUR REALTIME DASHBOARD
We give you a team of professional Upcallers to do your calls, and intuitive software to monitor your results. It’s everything you need to engage your contacts—without actually having to do the call yourself.

### 91% of marketing leadsare never qualified

## How Upcall Works
### 1A new lead comes in
It is automatically added to your campaign from any sources (Excel, API, online forms, CRM…) 
![People holding a pen⟨59⟩]
### Upcall calls within seconds
We engage in two-way conversations by phone and text. Our Upcallers are fully trained and experts at finding decision makers. We even call back 4 more times if they don't answer.
![Dynamic call script sequence⟨60⟩]
### 3Get notified with actionable results
We send you detailed call notes and the next steps immediately after hanging up. We even set meetings straight into your calendar and sync results with over 1,000 tools.
![People collaborating⟨61⟩]
Get started⟨14⟩

## Meet the Upcaller Network
These are the magic makers. Upcallers work behind the scenes to help your company scale and provide the experience and skills to match your needs.
  * ##### FULLY MANAGED
We only work with the top 5% call professionals who apply. All of our Upcallers are screened, vetted, and onboarded.
  * ##### HIGH QUALITY 
Our algorithm assigns your calls to the most fitting Upcallers based on location, industry and expertise.
  * ##### TRANSPARENT
Because Upcallers use our platform, you’re guaranteed consistent results and reporting of every call.
  * ##### ACCURATE
Upcallers use our various call dispositions, which help you analyze conversations at scale.

generated_description:
**Upcall: Outbound Call Professionals as a Service**

Founded in 2016 and hailing from the vibrant city of San Francisco, Upcall is set on redefining how companies approach outbound calling. After going through the prestigious Y Combinator program in the W17 batch, Upcall has emerged as a robust solution for businesses wanting to enhance customer engagement via real phone conversations.

The company’s mission is simple yet powerful: provide businesses with access to thousands of vetted U.S.-based call professionals, dubbed "Upcallers," ready to assist with everything from acquiring new customers to retaining existing ones. Their platform and API grant 24/7 access to these Upcallers while also providing tools such as call analytics, script templates, and recording features to manage call campaigns effectively. Plus, they integrate seamlessly with existing workflows through popular platforms like Slack, Salesforce, and Google Calendar.

### Key Offerings:

1. **Lead Generation**: Cold calling campaigns that spark interest in your products.
2. **Lead Qualification**: Engage leads immediately to verify interest via calls or texts.
3. **Customer Engagement**: Delve into customer experiences and enhance relationships with follow-ups and feedback calls.

Upcall is also committed to transparency—offering clients real-time dashboards to monitor campaign performance and results. Each Upcaller is a part of the top 5% of professionals in the field, rigorously vetted to ensure quality and consistency.

Notably, the company boasts a diverse client base of over 400 companies, including well-known names like Airbnb, Farmers Insurance, and Sotheby’s International Realty. This remarkable trust speaks volumes about the effectiveness and reliability of their service.

In short, Upcall is not just a vendor; it's a partner for companies looking to elevate their customer outreach through dedicated and skilled human interaction. If you’re looking to convert leads into loyal customers, Upcall’s service could be your next strategic advantage.

For more details on their offerings, visit [Upcall's website](https://www.upcall.com).
